snippet: John Terry capped his 400th Premier League appearance Sunday with a goal as host Chelsea fought back from an early deficit to beat Southampton.
abstract: John Terry caps his 400th Premier League appearance with a goal as host Chelsea fights back from an early deficit to beat Southampton, 3-1, and move up to second in the standings; other soccer news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and REUTERS

lead_paragraph: John Terry capped his 400th Premier League appearance Sunday with a goal as host Chelsea fought back from an early deficit to beat Southampton.
